aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Automatically created by the RestApi construct

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: eCommerceAmplifyApp
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.buildSpec:
version: "1.0"
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - npm install
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run build
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: build
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
